activities:
K2 Network is an online game publisher of 5 game titles currently. Since all game titles have an online presence, people from a global standpoint register to play our games and this includes receiving information from the EU.
War Rock (www.warrock.net)- an online first person shooter game is popular in Germany.
Sword of the New World (www.swordofthenewworld.com)- a massively multiplayer online role playing game is popular in France.
Red Stone (www.playredstone.com)- a massively multiplayer online role playing game.
Knight Online World (www.knightonlineworld.com)- a massively multiplayer role playing game
Global MU Online (www.globalmuonline.com)- a massively multiplayer role playing game
